description.value:
Activate 2 Interact

This dark green sludge has a caustic scent and gritty texture. Capable of entering the body through contact with flesh, toxic effluence becomes harmful once it hits the bloodstream, where it causes internal chemical burns, intense pain, and muscle spasms.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage, @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage, @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[5d6[poison]] damage, @Damage[5d6[fire]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3} (1 round)
